cab.content: &APHRASE TELEGRAM: The Governor-General of the Union of South Africa to the Secretary of State for the Colonies. '(Received Colonial Office 7.3.5 g-.m. 10th September '19)Urgent o September 10 th.With reference to my telegram of August 31et Peace treaty, Houoe of Assembly this after-noon adopted Ratification resolution by 84 votes to 19, The latter were all Nationalists, Resolution ras then transmitted to Senate for their concurrenceBtlXTON.
